content: After defeating the beast, head to the right up the narrow tree-lined trail to find a green Wisp and a few more Daoists guarding the pathway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Trail'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the beast, head to the right up the narrow tree-lined trail to find a green Wisp and a few more Daoists guarding the pathway.
